text: @davidicke What's next? The Santa Claus Virus. Are they gonna cancel Christmas and put everyone on Lockdown then too? Do we have to get a Vaccine to protect us from Santa Claus? Fuck Billionaire Bill and his God Damn Vaccines and the #COVID19. It's s Fucking Flu for Fuck sakes.
